name: Devil's Portrait
desc: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; Special Summon 1 monster with the same name from your Deck or Extra Deck (but return it to the Deck during the next turn's End Phase), also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Deck or Extra Deck. You can only activate 1 "Devil's Portrait" per turn.
